resources.string: Make sure your default Storage is set to Internal Storage. Also make sure you have \"Http Injector Lite\" installed on your phone you can download it on the Play Store. Once you installed it you can Continue.

Open Config Updater and the wait till you see \"READY\" at the bottom of your screen. If you don\'t see it after 5 to 15 seconds click on the 3 dots at the top right corner of your screen and press \"Retry Loading\". If it still doesn\'t work please check your Internet Connection.
In order to Download a Config you will need 1 Token. To get a Token press the 3 dots on the Top right corner then press "Get a Token". Confirm by pressing "Okay".
Once you have a Token. Choose a Available Network then press the Download Button next to it. Confirm by pressing \"Yes\".
Once you are done downloading a Config exit Config Updater. Then open Http Injector Lite.
Once you have opened Http Injector Lite press the Middle icon on the Top Right corner then press \"Import Config\".

Now locate the downloaded Config(s) they are stored at Internal Storage -> Android -> Data -> com.tmanswap.configupdater -> files -> Download -> then choose the Config you want, when using MTN choose 200mb before 100mb.
Once You have Chosen which Config you want press Start but only when you no longer have any Data. Enjoy\!
What if I still don\'t understand\?
Simply choose "Ask A Question" on the App then choose either FB, WhatsApp or telegram and ask your question there.
How do I know when 200mb(MTN) has been finished\?
Go to Http Injector Lite press START then press on the next tab \"LOG\" if you see \"status 302\" in bold text that means 200mb has been finished and you should switch to 100mb.
Who are the Artists on the App\?
You can find their names on our Facebook page called \"T\-Man\'s Wap\".
